 Giving gifts for MobiGold subscribers which pay all debt 1. Content: - Program 1: Giving gifts for MobiGold subscribers which pay all debt continuously in 2 months : Eligible subscriber : List Individual subscriber has billing’s address at center 2 and the average debt in 2 months from 21/9 - 11/11/2012 is from 1.000.000đ onwards. Details: Cycle 1: September and October ’s Bill Payment Cycle 11: October and November ’s Bill Payment Cycle 21: September and October ’s Bill Payment NOT APPLICABLE FOR : Subscribers which are joining VNPT promotion Subscribers which do not have any incurred cost or still have any left amount of the last payment from 21/09 - 11/11/2012 Term of giving gifts: First 5.000 customers pay all debt continuously in 2 months before being blocked 1 way communication ( be the eligible object in the list of first 5.000 paying in both 2 months) Time limit for paying: before 21/11/2012 . Gifts : High quality glass bowl of Korea (set of 3 pieces) + Thank you card. Time for receiving gifts : From 21/11/2012 to 31/12/2012 - Program 2: Giving gifts for long-term MobiGold subscribers which pay all debt: Eligible subscriber : List : sending announcement SMS on 29/10 in the afternoon Individual subscriber has billing’s address at center 2 and activates before 01/01/2010. The average incurred cost on first 10 months of 2012 is from 1.000.000đ onward s . NOT applicable for subscriber which does not have any incurred cost or still have any left amount of the last payment from 21/09 - 11/11/2012. Term of giving gifts : First 4.000 customers pay all debt: Cycle 1: October’s Bill Payment Cycle 11: October’s Bill Payment. Cycle 21: September ’s Bill Payment Time limit for paying: before 01/12/2012 . Gifts : High quality glass bowl of Korea (set of 3 pieces) + Thank you card. Time for receiving gifts : From 01/12/2012 to 31/12/2012 2. General regulation: Subscribers which are eligible for both of program can receive gift from only 1 in 2 program. 3. Way to give gifts: at the address where customer registers for sending Monthly Bill Payment 4. Time of promotion : From 21/10/2012 to 31/12/2012 &#32467;&#28165;&#35805;&#36153;&#30340; Mobigold &#23458;&#25143;&#33719;&#36192;&#31036;&#21697;&#27963;&#21160; 1.&#20869;&#23481;: - &#27963;&#21160; Mobigold &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6086;&#6038;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091; 1. &#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6102; -&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1&#6102; &#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6026;&#6076;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035; MG &#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6086;&#6038;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6038;&#6072;&#6042;&#6017;&#6082;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6018;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6102; MBF KV 2 &#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6086;&#6038;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6040;&#6034;&#6098;&#6041;&#6040;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091; 2 &#6017;&#6082;&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6026;&#6070;&#6047;&#6091;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6081;&#6025;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 21/09-11/11/2012 &#6038;&#6072; 1.000.000đ &#6049;&#6078;&#6020;&#6033;&#6085;. &#6021;&#6098;&#6036;&#6070;&#6047;&#6091;&#6043;&#6070;&#6047;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; 10 &#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;&#6033;&#6072; 11&#6102; &#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6026;&#6070;&#6047;&#6091;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6017;&#6082; 10 &#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6017;&#6082; 10 &#6040;&#6071;&#6035; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6066;&#6098;&#6041;&#6102; &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;VNPT &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6018;&#6098;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6016;&#6078;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6035;&#6085;&#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6026;&#6070;&#6047;&#6091;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6060;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6043;&#6078;&#6047;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 31/09-11/11/2012. &#6043;&#6096;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017;&#6096;&#6030;&#6098;&#6028;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6026;&#6076;&#6102; 5.000 &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6086;&#6038;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6017;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020; 1 &#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6031;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; 2 &#6017;&#6082;(&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020; 2 &#6017;&#6082;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6023;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091; 29/10/2012 &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6033;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6077;&#6035;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6047;&#6096;&#6041;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6035;&#6085;MBF KV 2 &#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;
